column1: '''''Samotni wobec historii''''' ("Solitary to History" [?]) is a Polish-language book, containing 14 articles. One of them deals with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]: "Tolkien czyli swiat" ("The World of Tolkien" [?]).<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam
column2: Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
